text:
@SenateGOP @senatemajldr And, it’s YOUR FAULT @senatemajldr 

Imagine totally abdicating leadership as #COVID19 kills 1,100 Americans a day continually failing to mobilize full resources of the federal govt to save lives yet sending armed federal agents to attack Americans in cities as political stunt
